programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Amy Got Back: Seth is shocked when Les brings back ex-pawn shop employee Amy. He later spots a mistake that could cost the store thousands of dollars. Is she to blame? (S7, ep 4)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Tripped Out Cash: There's trouble in the shop as a woman catches her boyfriend secretly trying to flog her ring. Plus, Les lays his hands on some priceless rock memorabilia. (S7, ep 5)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Motor Mouth: Les is tempted to break one of the pawn shop's biggest rules, when a fast-talking client catches him off guard. (S7, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Cold Blooded Robbery: Les ignores Ashley's cries to up security after she finds a potential robber hiding in the shop fridge. It's a move he may regret come nightfall. (S7, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Les' Spending Spree: Les can't stop buying, even though the store room is piled sky-high. In danger of being dubbed a hoarder, he faces big pressure to make some sales. (S7, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Burmese or Busted?: Les gets excited over a jar of powdered gold. He believes it's worth thousands. But is it valuable or just eyeshadow? An explosive acid test reveals all. (S7, ep 9)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Grounded & Pounded: In Plano, a locker of mixed martial arts gear puts Kenny in a compromising position. Meanwhile, Mary shows her ambition and Jenny dares to get devious. (S6, ep 6)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Hell's Half Acre: The auction action in Fort Worth inspires hot blood and sharp tongues as Bubba, Kenny and Matt go head to head. (S6, ep 7)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Fear The Short Fat Man: The bidders head to auctions in the small town of Waxahachie, where Jenny makes a scandalous discovery that could give her the payday of a lifetime. (S6, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: POW! It's A Surprise!: Kenny and Matt come to blows over a locker full of tools in DeSoto. Mary makes a purchase that leads her to the oldest Italian restaurant in Texas. (S6, ep 9)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry and Sam start at Bristol Classic Car Show, where they acquire a quirky car from the 1970s. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry and Sam buy and transform a BSA Bantam from a humble roadster into a trial bike. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Underground Alien Bases: The team investigates rumours of human-alien genetic experiments reportedly going on deep below the New Mexico desert in an underground base. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Underwater Alien Bases: The team investigates what appear to be underwater landing strips and other strange evidence in the wake of UFO sightings in Florida. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Evidence Of The Unexplained
programme.desc: Thousands of UFO sightings and abductions are reported every year. This series examines these accounts and casts new light on historic cases. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: The Unxplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: The Time Travelers: Explore whether time travel has already occurred - deliberately or by accident - and meet the scientists who believe it is theoretically possible. (S4, ep 1)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Alien Energy: From military radar to Navy aircraft, sightings of Unidentified Aerial Phenomena have become more frequent - leading to unprecedented acceptance of alien contact. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Black Knight: Is the satellite in Earth's orbit that astronauts discovered in 1998 the same one that Nikola Tesla detected back in 1899? (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Doorway: Do the doorways recently discovered on the surface of Mars lead to an existential lesson for our species? (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Final Dimension: According to physics, time travel is possible - so could these unidentified phenomena actually be us from the future? (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Ancient Structures: Certain structures on our planet have stood the test of time and continue to astonish mankind - so much so, that alien intervention has not been ruled out. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Hotspots: Some places are known for so many reports of UAP sightings that people flock from all around the world, just to catch a glimpse of a flying saucer. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: What Lies Below: UAPs have been seen entering the ocean at high speeds - and since our oceans can be as deep as six miles, were the UAPs simply trying to get home? (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Paradox: As the Fermi Paradox states, the likelihood of advanced life in the universe is surprisingly high - so why haven't we had any contact with extraterrestrial life? (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Physical Evidence: Physical evidence of alien activity has been hidden from the public for years - but it is starting to be revealed. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Wonders of the Universe: It is likely that aliens exist in a universe as large as ours. How would they navigate those vast distances and potentially visit us on earth? (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Cities Of The Underworld
programme.desc: Secret Sin City, Las Vegas: Presenter Don Wildman uncovers the underground secret surveillance nerve centres and the latest technology that beats the cheaters in Las Vegas. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Graves Concern: When a former Navy pilot and UAP whistleblower visits the ranch, an incredible event takes place that leaves the entire team in disbelief. (S5, ep 8)

programme.title: New: Cursed Histories
programme.desc: Barnum Museum: The world's greatest showman, a rumoured valley of gold and a fortress of protection - their legends prove fame, wealth and even safety can come at a dire cost. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Witches Of Salem
programme.desc: The Road to Hell: Paranoia spirals out of control as the demonic force terrorising Salem grows. Suspected witches are jailed and the accused face execution if found guilty. (2 of 4)

programme.title: Medieval Murder Mysteries
programme.desc: Amy Dudley: The Queen, Her Lover and His Wife: The death of Robert Dudley's wife in 1560 caused a scandal - as the nobleman was Elizabeth I's alleged lover. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Alien Corridors
programme.desc: Tinley Park: Annually, Illinois gets more than 300 UFO reports, so why are the Tinley Park sightings - with over 70 witnesses each year - the only reports that happen en masse? (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: UFOs Declassified

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Star family gets trapped in the bathroom in 'The Commode Episode', then in 'Tying the Klop-Knot', Bunny and Cecil need to have another Klopnodian wedding. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Watzie and Count Fabulous enter the human world in 'Furrmergency', then in 'Boogey Nightmare', Twyla must complete a rite of passage by pursuing a Night Terror through her friends' dreams. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Save the Past Dance: Tired of tales of Hiddenville's legendary mayor, the kids use a time machine to travel back to disprove the myths. But they inadvertently alter the past. (S4, ep 27)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Z's All That: Phoebe & Max get to act as a superhero mentor to one of their siblings, but quickly regret selecting Nora after seeing Billy's surprisingly impressive skillset. (S4, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Diamonds Are For Heather: Kid Danger and Captain Man are called to the Swellview Museum of Stools and Jewels to protect the rare Neal Diamond from being stolen. (S4, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Meet Cute Crush: Henry and Ray try to help Piper carry out a "meet cute" with a new boy she likes from school. (S4, ep 18)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Strange House: The Hunters set off for a holiday, but their directions lead them to an abandoned house in the forest. Things get stranger when they hear noises in the attic... (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Farmer's snails go on strike in 'The Snail Whisperer', and then in 'Smurfs Might Fly', The Smurfs prepare for their sarsaparilla banquet, unaware that Gargamel has enchanted the thicket. (S2, ep 17)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel, Queen of the Prom: When the Smurf Girls invite all the Smurfs to their Grand Equinox Ball, Gargamel and Azrael crash the party. (S2, ep 24b)

programme.title: Best & Bester

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Krusty Krab crew goes to a big concert to sell krabby patties in 'Krusty Koncessionaires', then in 'Dream Hoppers', SpongeBob explores the melodious dreamscapes of his sleeping neighbours.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs finds pets are profitable in 'A Place for Pets', then in 'Lockdown for Love', Plankton ruins another date with Karen, so she puts the Chum Bucket on lockdown until he proves his affection.

programme.title: Zokie of Planet Ruby
programme.desc: The magician Dee is working for disappears mid-act in 'Dazzling Dee', then in 'Anti-Scooper', Ruby and Zokie are ready to do whatever it takes to expose an anti-poop-scooping pet owner. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Fly: When Hazel has trouble adjusting to her move to Dimmadelphia, she discovers her neighbours, Cosmo and Wanda, are fairies! (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Something's Fishy: When Alvin and Simon think Theodore's pet goldfish has died, they go all out to replace it before he notices.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Devil Wears Rodentia: Brittany's dream of being a fashion designer turns into a nightmare when she gets a job and her ideas are stolen.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Big Bro Theodore: When Theodore mistakenly thinks he's the oldest brother, he tries to be a better role model for Alvin and Simon. (S4, ep 10a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Geizmo's Day Out: When Alvin kidnaps Simon's robot Geizmo, he gets a lesson in parenting a child going through their terrible twos. (S4, ep 26a)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds a good book which happens to be SpongeBob's private diary, in 'Little Yellow Book', and then in 'Bumper to Bumper', Mrs. Puff is again teaching SpongeBob to drive.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab in 'Eek, An Urchin!', and then in 'Squid's Defense', Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The Yoke's on You: Before the Prism Battle, Shadow and Sonic go head-to-head in an epic fight. In New Yoke City, the Chaos Council discover Sonic's connection to their power source. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Escape from New Yoke: The rebels battle the Chaos Council to secure the "Crystal" that gives supreme power. Sonic assumes this crystal is the Paradox Prism, but he's stunned by the truth. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Parent Zap: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat sweets, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. So Max and Phoebe transform into Hank and Barb. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Save The Date: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Scream Machine: When Charlotte's invention for The Gizmo Show is destroyed and then rebuilt, Charlotte worries that the attention could expose Kid Danger and Captain Man. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Trouble With Frittles: Captain Man and Kid Danger debate Swellview's favourite snack. As tensions rise, they must keep their preferences from affecting their job. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle in 'Shell Games', then in 'Senior Discount', Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward closes the gap in SpongeBob's teeth in 'Mind the Gap', and in 'Dirty Bubble Returns', a reformed "Clean Bubble" takes a dishwashing job at the Krusty Krab, where he is tempted by the grime.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Overlooked: Against Simon's wishes, Alvin borrows his latest invention, an invisibility suit, only to get the zipper stuck.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Opposites Attract: When an invention of Simon's accidently gets knocked over it magnetizes Alvin and Simon making them inseparable

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Clumsy Jeanette: Jeanette is suddenly the clumsiest person on the planet. Is there something wrong with her... or her new glasses? (S4, ep 2b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: World Day: To celebrate "World Day" and win a trip, the Chipmunks each get a country to represent for a school presentation. (S4, ep 15b)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina go undercover to investigate a corrupt novelty product factory in 'Patrickle Jokes', then in 'Pat Roast', The Patrick Show presents The Roast of Patrick Star. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina follow a runaway idea brick into Randomland in 'All Out of Idea Bricks', then in 'A Fool Schooled', the family provide home-schooling for Patrick. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Louds gather ingredients for an italian chef in 'Nonna Your Business', and the road trip continues in 'Alpining Away', when Lynn crushes on a boy. (S8, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Louds are invited to stay in a spooky castle in 'A Bite of Transylvania', then in 'Greece is the Word', during a tour of the Parthenon, Lincoln gets sent back to Ancient Greece. (S8, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward takes a new job as Manager of Weenie Hut Jr's in 'Wiener Takes All', then in 'Stuck in an Elevator', Squidward gets trapped on his way to return a nearly overdue library book. (S15, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward's amazing new life is threatened in 'Squidness Protection', and in 'Dome Alone', stuck in her dome, Sandy suspects Plankton's up to no good and recruits Patrick to investigate. (S15, ep 6)

programme.title: Tales of the Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Donnie Goes Deep: Donnie and Wingnut go to restore power to the Lair but get trapped by the East River 3! The water is rising and they're not alone - there's a monster down there as well! (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Chapa's Crush: When Danger Force fails a mission because Chapa is distracted by a crush, the gang has to track down her obsession and get their friend back to her normal self. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Car Trek: Charlotte's birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: Sam & Cat

programme.desc: BlooperEpisode: Jennette, Ariana, Cameron, Maree and Zoran are on their lunch break from filming Sam & Cat and have an hour before they're due back, but are interrupted by fans. (S1, ep 28)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Tori and Jade's Play Date: Tori and Jade play a married couple putting their acting and friendship to the test. Cat and Robbie start a service to deliver bad news in a nice way. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Ditch Perfect: When Phoebe learns Max's band plans to dump him, she suspects that his superhero training is hurting his friendships. Determined to help, her good deeds backfire. (S4, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.desc: Lori struggles to make a good impression in 'Day of the Dad', then in 'Small Blunder', desperate to have the best show-and-tell in class, Lily takes Lisa's shrink ray to school. (S6, ep 24)

programme.desc: Introduce a touch of glamour into your home with JM by Julien Macdonald. From sophisticated home furnishings to fabulous accessories, discover fresh designs that will transform your space.

programme.title: Bank Holiday Deals
programme.desc: A selection of brilliant offers on all sorts of products - because while we can't promise great weather this Bank Holiday weekend, we can promise a great deal.

programme.desc: Home Shopping.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto'n dod o hyd i allwedd wedi ei chuddio yn llyfr mawr pwysig ei dad. Guto finds a mysterious key hidden in his father's journal and is determined to find out what it fits.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Y Traeth to create excellent treasure.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod sioe Arddangos Llysiau Gorau Pontypandy. Mae'r plant wedi tyfu pwmpen enfawr ond mae Jams a hi yn cael antur a hanner! It's the day of Pontypandy's Best Vegetable Show!

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, a phan mae o'n hapus mae o'n hoffi fflapio ei freichiau. Palo flaps so much that he flies away and the Book Animals have to track him down.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Tib, Lalw a Bobl yn ymweld Hen Gloc y Goedwig - y peth hynaf yn y goedwig, nd mae wedi stopio... Tib, Lalloo and Bobble visit the Old Forest Clock - the oldest thing in the forest!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Gwiber yn creu trafferth glan yr afon er mwyn cael bwyta tarten afal taffi Dan i gyd. Gwiber sets one riverbanker against the other in order to seize all of Dan's toffee apple pie.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan aiff Cadi ar goll, mae angen i'r dreigiau ei hachub. When Cadi goes missing, it's up to the dragons to come to her rescue.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Daw Pero i chwilio am gymorth gan fod Talfryn wedi torri ei fys. Pero seeks help when Talfryn has a broken finger, so Blero and his friends save the day and discover bones are amazing.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Mam eisiau taflu Terariwm Dad, ond ma'r efeilliaid yn benderfynol o achub y byd bach. Mum wants to throw away Dad's Terrarium, but the twins are determined to save the little habitat.

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn y stiwdio, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Anni a Cai'n penderfynu chwarae cuddio. Ond mae Cai a Bochau'n methu dod o hyd i Anni, ydy hi'n creu annibendod yn rhywle? Anni and Cai decide to play hide and seek, but there's chaos! [SL]

programme.title: Canu Gyda Fy Arwr: Mike Peters
programme.desc: Ail-ddangos fel teyrnged i'r diweddar Mike Peters. Rhys Meirion sy'n canu gyda rhai o'i arwyr cerddorol o tro ma, gan gynnwys prif ganwr The Alarm. Repeat in tribute to the late Mike Peters. [SL]

programme.title: Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd
programme.desc: Tro ma, awn i Wicklow, Chill Mhantin i ddechrau, ac yn ail ran y bennod, daw'r teulu nl i'w cartre cyntaf yma yng Nghymru a glanio yn Sir Benfro. This time: Wicklow and Pembrokeshire. [SL]

programme.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
programme.desc: Mae Emrys a Sue yn teithio i Scottsdale, Arizona ar antur i brynu ceffylau i rai o'u cleientiaid cyfoethog. The pair travel to Scottsdale, Arizona for the world's largest Arabian horse show. [SL]

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Bydd Meinir yn ymweld rali CFFI Sir Gaerfyrddin, ac Alun fydd yn blasu rum go wahanol i'r arfer. Nia has the latest regarding the customs agreement between America and the United Kingdom. [SL]

programme.title: Cais Quinnell
programme.desc: Scott Quinnell sy'n ymarfer ei Gymraeg wrth deithio Cymru a chael llond bol o hwyl. This week Scott will be sea foraging, enjoying a 'gong bath' and having a drag masterclass. [SL]

programme.title: Siwrna Scandi Chris
programme.desc: Pennod olaf. Mae Chris yn profi danteithion Copenhagen yn Denmarc. Last episode, and Chris heads to Copenhagen to sample the culinary delights of Denmark. [SL]

programme.title: Northampton v Bordeaux Bgles
programme.desc: Welsh language coverage. Gm fyw Ffeinal Cwpan y Pencampwyr Investec: Northampton v Bordeaux-Bgles. C/G 14.45. Investec Champions Cup Final: Northampton v Bordeaux-Bgles. K/O 14.45.

programme.title: Rygbi Cymru yn Ewrop 30
programme.desc: Gyda Rygbi Ewrop yn dathlu carreg filltir nodedig, dyma raglen gyda uchafbwyntiau'r gystadleuaeth drwy'r degawdau. As European Rugby celebrates 30 years, here are the competition highlights.

programme.title: 3 Lle: Aled Sin Davies
programme.desc: Cyfle arall i weld Aled Sin Davies yn dewis ei dri hoff le. Another chance to see Paralympic athlete Aled Sin Davies visiting three favourite places.

programme.title: Ralio Pencampwriaeth Rali'r Byd '25
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau pumed rownd Pencampwriaeth Rali'r Byd o Bortiwgal, yng nghwmni Emyr Penlan, Hana Medi a Rhys ap William. Highlights from the World Rally Championship Portugal's fifth round.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas
programme.desc: Sir Benfro yw'r stop nesaf i Beti a Huw, ac hynny yng ngwesty'r Grove yn Narberth. This time, the duo enjoy a feast from soil to plate at the Grove Hotel in Narberth.

programme.title: Aur y Noson Lawen
programme.desc: Ifan Jones Evans sy'n pori trwy hanes un o'n rhaglenni teledu adloniant mwyaf poblogaidd. Join Ifan Jones Evans as he dips into the archives of one of Wales' best-loved TV shows.

programme.title: Eisteddfod '24 Llwyfan y Maes: EDEN
programme.desc: Cyngerdd byw arbennig gan Eden yn Eisteddfod Genedlaethol Rhondda Cynon Taf 2024. A special live concert by Eden at the Rhondda Cynon Taf National Eisteddfod 2024.

programme.title: Yn y Lwp
programme.desc: Y DJ a'r cyflwynydd, Molly Palmer, sydd yn ein tywys drwy gynnwys cerddorol diweddar Lwp. DJ and presenter, Molly Palmer, guides us through Lwp's recent musical content.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Gwyrdd yn llawn syndod pan mae Du a Gwyn yn cyrraedd ei choedwig. Green is surprised when Black and White arrive in her forest.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Dilys y cocyrpw ac Aneira a'i chrwbanod. Today we meet Dilys the cockerpoo and Aneira and her tortoises.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Harri gets a call to the Loggerheads park. He and Aled fix the bug hotel making sure the caterpillar has a safe home. Mae Harri'n cael galwad i barc Loggerheads i drwsio gwesty'r pryfed.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Pan mae Tomi'n methu ffeindio'r trysor mae wedi'i guddio, mae'r Whws yn gweld gwiwer yn palu am rywbeth. When Scotty can't find the treasure he hid, the Woohoos spot a squirrel digging!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweliad ag Ynys Enlli, antur feicio gyda'r teulu ger Llys y Fran, a cwrdd merch o'r enw Enlli a'i chwn defaid. Join Meleri and Huw on all sorts of adventures in the open air.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae brecwast arbennig ar fwydlen y bwyty heddiw, ond yn anffodus, mae ieir Magi wedi diflannu a hebddyn nhw does dim wyau. Sin is trying a new breakfast menu today, but there are no eggs!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae afalau yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd hi i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio go iawn iddi. Nel wants to know where Apples come from.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twm Twrch a'i fam yn edrych ymlaen i fynd a'u dyfais i'r gystadleuaeth wyddonol - ond yn anffodus mae 'na ddamwain! There's a device, a Science Competition, and an accidental breakage!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae'r amgueddfa'n ddiflas yn l Joni, tan bod Beti Bowen yn ceisio dwyn DNA'r mamoth! The museum is boring according to Joni, until Beti Bowen comes to try to steal the DNA of the mammoth!

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, awn i Sbaen i gwrdd a'r Wenynen Feirch ac i Awstralia er mwyn cael cwrdd a'r Ecidna. We're off to Spain to meet the Wasp and to Australia to get to know the Echidna.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae rap Twrchyn yn denu cynulleidfa annisgwyl - haid o ystlumod. Twrchyn's rap draws an unexpected crowd - a colony of bats.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ystalyfera sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Ystalyfera join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i edych 'nl dros rai o gyfarchion pen-blwydd yr wythnos. A look back at some of this week's birthday greetings.

programme.title: Nl i'r Gwersyll
programme.desc: Mae cabanau pren a phebyll Llangrannog y 60au yn l. Pa weithgareddau fydd wedi'u trefnu gan y 'swogs', Mici Plwm a Dilwyn Morgan? This time, the wooden cabins and tents of the 60s are back!

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Meinir wrth ei bodd yn croesawu Sioned ag Adam i Bant y Wennol. Adam advises Meinir on using vegetables in an ornamental border, and Sioned creates an interesting display using mint.

programme.title: Cynefin
programme.desc: ByddHeledd, Iestyn a Ffion yn cyrraedd Bro Dysynni - ardal sy'n cuddio tu l i lethrau mynydd Cadair Idris rhwng Machynlleth a Dolgellau. We discover more about beautiful Bro Dysynni.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Ymweliad chefn gwlad Sir Gaernarfon i weld sut ma Sir Nawdd y Sioe Frenhinol eleni yn paratoi at yr wythnos fawr. We visit the Feature County, Caernarfon, for this year's Royal Welsh Show.

programme.title: Taith Bywyd
programme.desc: Owain Williams sy'n trefnu taith sbeshal i'r hyfforddwr pl-droed Osian Roberts, i ail-fyw adegau pwysig ei fywyd. Owain Williams organises a special trip for football coach Osian Roberts.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Y tro yma ar Y Fets: mae cryn ddyfalu am beth sy'n gyrru Kiki'r gath yn wyllt, ac mae'r staff yn brwydro i achub bywyd Cadi'r Westie. The staff battle to save Cadi the Westie's life.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Yn rhaglen ola'r gyfres hon o 2010, bydd Harri'n crwydro prif dref Pen Llyn - Pwllheli. In the last of his journeys in this 2010 series, author Harri Parri visits the town of Pwllheli.

programme.title: Y Sn
programme.desc: Ail gyfres Y Sn efo Francesca Sciarrillo a Joe Healy. Yn y bennod yma, dysgwn am baentio arwyddion gyda llaw, ac am sin gomedi'r Cymoedd. We visit an art residency on Bardsey Island.

programme.title: Am Dro
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd, a chawn deithiau i arfordir Penarth, Penllyn, Parc Gwledig Loggerheads ac o Gastell Carreg Cennen i fynydd Tair Carn Isaf. New series, and Ryan, Helen, Alaw and Ted compete!

programme.title: Yr Ynys: Fiji
programme.desc: Gareth Davies sydd yn mynd ar daith o lan y mr i berfedd y wlad i weithio, chwarae, bwyta a dathlu gyda phobl Fiji. Another chance to see Gareth Davies' visit to the islands of Fiji.

programme.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
programme.desc: Dewi Prysor sy'n cynnig golwg ffres ar hanes trysorau Llyn Cerrig Bach, Ynys Mn. Dewi Prysor looks into the history of the Llyn Cerrig Bach bronze and iron artefacts on Anglesey.

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Bydd Meinir yn ymweld rali CFFI Sir Gaerfyrddin, ac Alun fydd yn blasu rum go wahanol i'r arfer. Nia has the latest regarding the customs agreement between America and the United Kingdom.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Cyfres omnibws yn edrych nl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Rhai o uchafbwyntiau'r gyfres - Gwyl Ddrama Capel Pencaenewydd a nofio gwyllt yng Nghei Newydd. Series highlights: a drama festival near Pwllheli, wild swimming in New Quay, and more.

programme.title: New: Prosiect Pum Mil
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn nhref Rhydaman yr wythnos hon i helpu cangen Derwen Newydd o elusen y Wallich. The gang are in Ammanford this week to help the Derwen Newydd branch of the Wallich charity.

programme.title: Croeso i Eisteddfod yr Urdd
programme.desc: Sarra Elgan sy'n edrych ymlaen at Eisteddfod yr Urdd 'Dur a Mr' 2025 ym Mharc Margam, Port Talbot. Sarra Elgan guides us through what's in store at 2025's Eisteddfod yr Urdd at Margam Park.

programme.title: Troseddau Cymru Gyda Sian Lloyd
programme.desc: Hanes noson erchyll ym Mhenmaenmawr yn y 70au, pan fu Neil Rutherford saethu 4 person yn farw a llosgi gwesty'r Red Gables cyn lladd ei hunan. Story of a massacre at a hotel in Penmaenmawr.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres yn edrych ar wahanol fathau o gartrefi yng Nghymru. Yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn edrych ar dai Eco-gyfeillgar. This time, we'll be focusing on Eco-friendly houses.

programme.title: Day of the Nightmare
programme.desc: 1965. Horror. Director: John Bushelman. Stars John Ireland, Beverly Bain, Cliff Fields. An artist's wife searches for answers when her husband is accused of murder, but will she make it out alive? [S]

programme.title: Boris Karloff: The Man Behind
programme.desc: the Monster. 2021. Documentary. Directed by Thomas Hamilton. Features Ron Perlman, Guillermo del Toro. A look at the life and legacy of Boris Karloff, and the history of the genre he personified.

programme.title: The Rogues
programme.desc: 1965. Death of a Fleming. Gig Young, David Niven and Charles Boyer are The Rogues, members of two related families of international forgers and conmen. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Operation Barbarossa. 1964. Narrator: Anthony Quayle. It's 1941, Hitler begins Operation Barbarossa - the conquest of Russia. On the other side of the world, Japanese bombs fall on Pearl Harbour. [S]

programme.title: Thunder In The City
programme.desc: 1937. Comedy. Stars Edward G. Robinson, Nigel Bruce, Constance Collier & Ralph Richardson. A visiting American engages in a bold business promotion, the likes of which the British have never seen. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: A Circus Story. 1946. Narrated by Ronald Waldman. An entrancing short film which looks at the circus at Belle Vue in Manchester, with an exciting array of performances.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: Mystery on the Moon. 1963. Stars Murray Kash, Ronnie Stevens & Dick Vosburgh. Space Headquarters is threatened with destruction by laser beam unless Berridge gets a freighter full of gold. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Dizzonner the Penguin. 1966. Stars Adam West, Burgess Meredith & Woodrow Parfrey. The Penguin kidnaps members of the election board in an attempt to sway the votes to become mayor in his favour. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Challenge. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Zena Marshall & Trader Faulkner. Richard is challenged by Zara, Princess of Granada, into a joust with her brother, Ubaldo, with her as the prize. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: Amazonian Adventure. 1961. Stars David Graham, George Murcell & Graydon Gould. Mike goes on a dangerous mission to South America using Supercar to locate a plant needed to save Mitch's life. [S]

programme.title: The Great Pony Raid
programme.desc: 1968. Family. Director: Frederic Goode. Starring: Christian Comber, Tina Paget Brown, Andrew Purcell & Shelley Crowhurst. Children try to help capture men planning to steal Dartmoor ponies. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: Hue and Cry. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, John Arnatt & Kevin Stoney. When the Deputy Sheriff's chain of office is stolen, he threatens to kill a group of villagers if the perpetrator isn't found. [S]

programme.title: Beyond the Time Barrier
programme.desc: 1960. Sci-fi. Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer. Stars Robert Clarke & Darlene Tompkins. A military test pilot is propelled into the future where he finds a plague has sterilised the world's population. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: It's time to move with Vince Taylor as he performs Whole Lotta Twisting.

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Navigator. 1959. Starring: Don Dubbins, Robert Ellenstein & Don Womack. The crew of a sailing ship find that somebody has altered its course before catching stowaways. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Julian Bond. Mr Parkes (Terence Seward), a playboy, & Mrs Aston (Marsha Fitzalan), wife of a Whitehall official, are threatened by the Drew Brothers (Ernie Drew by Bernard Kay).

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Fire at Rig 15. 1968. Stars Ed Bishop, Martin King & David Healy. The Mysterons threaten to immobilise Spectrum by sabotaging the drill on the oil rig that acts as Spectrum's only source of fuel.

programme.title: Mon Oncle
programme.desc: 1958. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. With Jean-Pierre Zola & Lucien Frgis. Monsieur Hulot visits the technological world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but can't fit in. [S]

programme.title: Derek Fowlds: Jobbing Actor
programme.desc: Best known for The Basil Brush Show, Yes Minister and Heartbeat, Derek Fowlds looks back at his 60 year career and recalls many of the famous names and productions that he's been associated with. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1961. The Grand Junction Case. Directed by Peter Duffell. Starring Russell Napier and Howard Pays. A woman's dismembered body is found in a canal and her tattoo gives Duggan a lead. (S1, E36)

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Quarry. 1977. Stars Marc Boyle & Mike Elles. It takes over four minutes to get out of the quarry. The police sealed it off in under two. How have four raiders and a boxful of dynamite vanished? [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1971. The Other Side of the Hill. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. New Year, 1940. Sefton fights to keep Edwin at the works whilst David returns to his old ways. (S2, E01) [S]

programme.title: The Big Combo
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Director: Joseph H. Lewis. Stars Cornel Wilde & Jean Wallace. A police lieutenant, on a mission to bring down an elusive crime boss, targets the gangster's girlfriend to get her help. [S]

programme.title: The Innocent
programme.desc: 1993. Drama. Directed by John Schlesinger. Stars Isabella Rossellini & Anthony Hopkins. An engineer is sent to Berlin to help the U.S. spy on the USSR, but he falls for a mysterious local woman.

programme.title: The Innocent
programme.desc: 1993. Drama. Directed by John Schlesinger. Stars Isabella Rossellini & Anthony Hopkins. An engineer is sent to Berlin to help the U.S. spy on the USSR, but he falls for a mysterious local woman.

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: 1958. Sci-fi Horror. Director: Kurt Neumann. Stars David Hedison, Vincent Price & Patricia Owens. A keen scientist has a horrifying accident when he tests his newly invented teleportation device. [S]

programme.title: Dead Man Out

programme.title: Shoulder Arms
programme.desc: 1918. Comedy. Directed by Charles Chaplin. Stars Charles Chaplin, Edna Purviance & Syd Chaplin. Charlie is a boot camp private, with a dream of being a hero, who goes on a daring mission.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Calendar. 1981. Hargreaves presents a 'moving calendar' of his films featuring pony riding in the New Forest, grandfather clocks, fishing for conger and barbel, cottage gardens and a sheep fair. [S]

programme.title: Department Store

programme.title: Dick Emery on Wiggins!

programme.title: Voyage to the Planet of Prehistoric Women

programme.title: Dick Tracy Vs Cueball

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Rescues Pearl. 1962. Stars Max Baer Jr., Bea Benaderet & Elvia Allman. The Clampetts are missing their Beverly Hills mansion, but Jed says they have to stay until Pearl wins over Mr. Brewster. [S]

programme.title: Vengeance Valley

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Dizzonner the Penguin. 1966. Stars Adam West, Burgess Meredith & Woodrow Parfrey. The Penguin kidnaps members of the election board in an attempt to sway the votes to become mayor in his favour. [S]

programme.title: Brandy for the Parson

programme.title: Blue Pullman

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood

programme.title: Out of Town

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: 9/35. Charlie and Lee head to Tadley to bring bright colour and 'wow factor' to the couple's garden, all for 4,000.

programme.title: Garden Rescue

programme.title: My Floating Home

programme.title: My Floating Home

programme.title: My Floating Home
